kpi.name: RNC_1778a

kpi_info.title: Peak number of AMR users in RNC
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the maximum amount of AMR users allocated in the RNC.
kpi_info.formula:
SUM(DSP_SERVICE_PEAK_RES_ALLOC[k=0]+DSP_SERVICE_PEAK_RES_ALLOC[k=1])

where k relates to service type:

k=0 -> ServType=AMR
k=1 -> ServType=IPIUAMR

kpi.kpi_alias: Peak number of AMR users in RNC
